## Swagger UI base64

This page allow render any swagger spec encoded in base64

http://127.0.0.1:3000/index.html?


### Why base64?

To create shareable links for your OpenApi Specification without any other server.

### How to trasform my json to base64?

```
cat openapi.json | base64 > openapi.base64
```
Or use online tools to trasform to base64
